text: Alloh taolo [ʙaroi muqoisai muşriku muvahhid] mardero misol mezanad, ki cand şarik dar ʙorai [molikijati] ū pajvasta ʙo ham ixtilofu muşoçara dorand va dar muqoʙilaş marde, ki tahti farmoni jak nafar qaror dorad. Ojo in du nafar [az nazari mavqeijat] jaksonand? Sitoiş maxsusi Alloh taolo ast, vale ʙeştaraşon namedonand
